title: Inferno Cop
synopsis: Jack Knife Edge Town is as edgy as it sounds, and it's up to Inferno Cop to stop that edge from tearing his city apart. He's both law and outlaw, dispensing ungodly justice to evildoers like a candy machine. Lowlifes, gangsters, and even hellspawn all infest Inferno Cop's hunting ground, but that's the good news. The bad news? Prior to the story, his family was brutally murdered by Southern Cross, a shady organization that made the worst mistake imaginable by doing so. Now, Inferno Cop's limiters have been removed and his mercy rung more dry than the entrails of his victims.
related_anime: ['Inferno Cop: Fact Files', 'Uchuu Patrol Luluco', 'Inferno Cop 2nd Season', 'Inferno Cop Specials']
characters: ['Inferno Cop', 'Mecha Cop', 'Hellfire Boy', 'Real God', 'Mr. Judge', 'Claudia', 'Suzuki, Ariel', 'Auntie Grenda']
